#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<set>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int a1,a2,a3,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,r3x1,r3y1,r4x1,r4y1,e,f,g,p,d,c,i,j,k,m,q,n,l1,l2,sum=0,z,test,ans;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test)
    {
        ans=0;
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x3,&y3,&x4,&y4);

/*
        a1 = abs(y2-y1)*abs(x2-x1);
        a2= abs(y4-y4)*abs(x4-x3);
        */
        a1 = (y2-y1)*(x2-x1);
        a2= (y4-y3)*(x4-x3);
        ans = a1+a2;
        r3x1= max(x1,x3);
        r3y1 = max(y1,y3);
        r4x1= min(x2,x4);
        r4y1 = min(y2,y4);
        if((r4x1>r3x1) && (r4y1>r3y1))
        {
           // printf("IN if loop\n");
            a3 = (r4y1-r3y1)*(r4x1-r3x1);
            ans = ans-a3;
        }

       // printf("Value are a1= %d, a2= %d , a3 =  %d\n",a1,a2,a3);
        printf("%d\n",ans);
        test-- ;
    }
return 0;
}
